newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Dec 23.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Dec 23.

text.p: Some Australian stocks to watch this morning:
Advance shareholders meet this morning to vote on a proposal to merge with St George Bank amid speculation that National Australia Bank Ltd will try to block the merger.

Highlands announced on Monday that its directors had unanimously resolved to reject the takeover bid by Placer Dome Inc, citing an independent report showing Highlands shares to be worth about 40 percent more than the 75 cent per share offer price.
* The Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd A$17.48 (+.43)

BHP, the world's second-largest copper producer said on Friday it aimed to slash its copper production costs in North America to below 60 U.S. cents a pound and across-the-board to well below 50 cents.
Cement maker said on Monday it had sold its Humes Pipe businesses in New Zealand for a little more than NZ$58 million.
